AIX LVM Cool CLIs

  1. Mount all filesystems on an AIX server in one line 
     lsvg -o | xargs -n1 lsvgfs | sort | xargs -n1 mount
  2. Unmount all filesystems in one line 
     lsvg -o | xargs -n1 lsvgfs | sort -r | xargs -n1 umount
  3. Unlock a Volume Group so that the VG can be imported on the other host 
     varyonvg -b -u <vg_name>

    On the remote host do 

     importvg -n -y <vgname> diskname
  4. Create a JFS2 filesystem 
    mklv -t jfs2 -y <lvname> <vgname> <no_of_lps> <hdisk.....> 
crfs -v jfs2 -d <lvname> -m <mountpoint> -A yes -t no
